headline: Does Seagate (STX) Leaning Into AI Edge Storage Reframe Its Core Competitive Moat?
summary: Earlier in January, Seagate Technology showcased its latest 32TB Exos, SkyHawk AI, and IronWolf Pro hard drives at Intersec 2026, emphasizing edge‑to‑cloud storage solutions for AI-driven video analytics and data-heavy workloads. This focus on mass-capacity drives for AI video image analytics highlights how Seagate is positioning its core storage business around rapidly expanding edge data needs. Next, we'll examine how Seagate's push into AI-focused, high-capacity storage at the edge could...
